what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install development version stanflow GitHub :

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: package allows quick access full Stan modelling pipeline, flexibility regards fitting procedure. , load stanflow decide use cmdstanr backend brms. two commands (setup_interface() call unnecessarily verbose), users access everything need fit analyze models. Specifically, two commands load core stanflow packages: bayesplot, loo, posterior, projpred shinystan, setup brms use cmdstanr backend many cores available machine. package “library()d” well, can proceed analysis immediately.
code: library(stanflow) setup_interface(   interface = "brms",   dev = FALSE,   prefer_cmdstanr = TRUE,   quiet = FALSE,   force = FALSE,   skip_setup = FALSE ) #> ℹ Adding cmdstanr to setup because `prefer_cmdstanr = TRUE` #> ℹ Attaching brms... #> ℹ Configured brms: set `options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores())` and `options(brms.backend = 'cmdstanr')` #> ℹ Attaching cmdstanr... #> The C++ toolchain required for CmdStan is setup properly! #> ℹ Found CmdStan v2.37.0 at 'C:/Users/visru/.cmdstan/cmdstan-2.37.0' #> ✔ Setup complete. brms, cmdstanr are attached; you do not need to run `library()`. cmdstanr_example() #>    variable   mean median   sd  mad     q5    q95 rhat ess_bulk ess_tail #>  lp__       -65.95 -65.61 1.45 1.27 -68.78 -64.26 1.00     2018     2465 #>  alpha        0.38   0.37 0.22 0.22   0.03   0.75 1.00     4205     2866 #>  beta[1]     -0.67  -0.67 0.25 0.24  -1.09  -0.29 1.00     4245     3202 #>  beta[2]     -0.27  -0.28 0.23 0.21  -0.65   0.11 1.00     3573     3267 #>  beta[3]      0.68   0.68 0.27 0.26   0.25   1.12 1.00     3895     3115 #>  log_lik[1]  -0.51  -0.51 0.10 0.10  -0.68  -0.36 1.00     4094     3085 #>  log_lik[2]  -0.40  -0.38 0.15 0.14  -0.68  -0.20 1.00     4901     3537 #>  log_lik[3]  -0.50  -0.47 0.22 0.21  -0.89  -0.20 1.00     4227     2544 #>  log_lik[4]  -0.45  -0.43 0.15 0.14  -0.73  -0.24 1.00     4067     3150 #>  log_lik[5]  -1.18  -1.16 0.28 0.28  -1.69  -0.75 1.00     4355     2783 #>  #>  # showing 10 of 105 rows (change via 'max_rows' argument or 'cmdstanr_max_rows' option)  # from brms readme: fit1 <- brm(   count ~ zAge + zBase * Trt + (1 | patient),   data = epilepsy,   family = poisson() ) #> Start sampling #> Running MCMC with 4 chains, at most 20 in parallel... #>  #> Chain 1 Iteration:    1 / what: Print stanflow status and conflicts — flow_check
title: Print stanflow status and conflicts — flow_check
text: Print consolidated status report showing attached packages, available interfaces, conflicts.

title: Print stanflow status and conflicts — flow_check
Print stanflow status and conflicts — flow_check
text: Invisibly returns character vector printed.

what: Setup and Load Stan Interfaces — setup_interface
title: Setup and Load Stan Interfaces — setup_interface
text: function ensures specific Stan interfaces installed, configured, loaded. handles package installation (R-multiverse/CRAN (stable) Stan universe (dev)) performs necessary one-time setup (like installing CmdStan).

title: Setup and Load Stan Interfaces — setup_interface
code: setup_interface(   interface = c("brms", "cmdstanr", "rstan", "rstanarm"),   dev = FALSE,   prefer_cmdstanr = FALSE,   quiet = FALSE,   force = FALSE,   skip_setup = FALSE )

title: Setup and Load Stan Interfaces — setup_interface
text: interface character vector. Select least one : "brms", "cmdstanr", "rstan", "rstanarm". dev Logical. FALSE (default), installs stable releases R-multiverse CRAN. TRUE, installs development versions Stan R-universe. prefer_cmdstanr Logical. TRUE, configures brms use cmdstanr backend instead default rstan. quiet Logical. TRUE, suppresses status messages. force Logical. TRUE, forces re-installation/setup. Required installation non-interactive sessions. skip_setup Logical. TRUE, packages attached backend-specific configuration run.

title: Setup and Load Stan Interfaces — setup_interface
text: Returns NULL invisibly.

what: Print the Stan ASCII art logo — stan_logo
title: Print the Stan ASCII art logo — stan_logo
text: Emits Stan ASCII art logo via cli::cat_line().

title: Print the Stan ASCII art logo — stan_logo
Print the Stan ASCII art logo — stan_logo
text: Invisibly returns character vector printed.

title: Print the Stan ASCII art logo — stan_logo
code: stan_logo() #>            G08GLG80G            #>         G80LLLLLLLLL08G         #>     G08GLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLG80G     #>  G80LLLLLLLLLLLLLLCG08@@@@@@8G  #> 8LLLLLLLLLLLC8@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ #> 8LLLLLLLLL8@@@@@@@@@@@@@@800GC8 #> 8LLLLLLLL8@@@@80GCLLLLLLLLLLLL8 #> 8LLLLLLLGtiiiitfLLLLLLLLLLLLLL8 #> 8LLLLLLLfiiiiiiiii1fLLLLLLLLLL8 #> 8LLLLLLLLLLLLftiiiiiifLLLLLLLL8 #> 8LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLGLLLLLLLLL8 #> 8LLLLLLLLLLLLLG0@@0CLLLLLLLLLL8 #> 8LLLLCG0880GCLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL8 #>  G80LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLGCG08G  #>     G08GLLLLLLLLLLLLCGCG80G     #>         G80LLLLLLLCL08G         #>            G08GLG80G

what: Conflicts between stanflow and other packages — stanflow_conflicts
title: Conflicts between stanflow and other packages — stanflow_conflicts
text: function lists conflicts packages stanflow loaded packages.

title: Conflicts between stanflow and other packages — stanflow_conflicts
Conflicts between stanflow and other packages — stanflow_conflicts
text: Set character vector restrict conflicts packages.

title: Conflicts between stanflow and other packages — stanflow_conflicts
text: several conflicts deliberately ignored: diag, drop, match, %% posterior.

title: Conflicts between stanflow and other packages — stanflow_conflicts
code: stanflow_conflicts() #> ── Conflicts ─────────────────────────────────────────── stanflow_conflicts() ── #> ✖ posterior::mad()  masks stats::mad() #> ✖ posterior::rhat() masks bayesplot::rhat() #> ✖ posterior::sd()   masks stats::sd() #> ✖ posterior::var()  masks stats::var() #> ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors

title: List all stanflow dependencies — stanflow_deps
text: List stanflow dependencies

title: List all stanflow dependencies — stanflow_deps
List all stanflow dependencies — stanflow_deps
text: recursive TRUE, also list dependencies. dev FALSE (default), checks updates R-multiverse CRAN (stable releases). TRUE, checks Stan R-universe (dev versions).

title: Update stanflow packages — stanflow_update
Update stanflow packages — stanflow_update
text: recursive TRUE, also list dependencies. dev FALSE (default), checks updates R-multiverse CRAN (stable releases). TRUE, checks Stan R-universe (dev versions).
